Token.Abstract: Provides a mechanism for storing thread-specific data in a way that's designed to avoid key naming clashes.
Returns the thread-local value associated with the specified class.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The Class responsible for the thread-local value. Must not be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The thread-local value, or nil if one was not previously set on the calling thread for the specified class.

Token.Abstract: Returns the thread-local value associated with the specified class and key.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The Class responsible for the thread-local value. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the value to retrieve. If nil, the effect is the same as calling valueForClass:.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The thread-local value, or nil if one was not previously set on the calling thread for the specified class.

Token.Abstract: Sets a thread-local value for the given class.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value to store. Passing nil will remove a value stored previously.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The Class responsible for the thread-local value. Must not be NULL.

Token.Abstract: Sets a thread-local value for the given class.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The value to store. Passing nil will remove a value stored previously.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The Class responsible for the thread-local value. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the value being set. If nil, the effect is the same as calling setValue:forClass:.

Token.Abstract: Allows use of thread-local storage as a lock-free cache. If the requested value is not in the cache, the block provided will be executed to create a new instance.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The Class responsible for the thread-local value. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: instantiator
Parameter.Abstract: A block used to create a new cached object instance. This block will be executed only when there is not an existing cached value in thread-local storage. It is considered an error for the instantiator block to return nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The cached object, which should not be nil unless there is an error within the instantiator block.

Token.Abstract: Allows use of thread-local storage as a lock-free cache. If the requested value is not in the cache, the block provided will be executed to create a new instance.

Parameter.Name: cls
Parameter.Abstract: The Class responsible for the thread-local value. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the cached value. If nil, the effect is the same as calling cachedValueForClass:usingInstantiator:.

Parameter.Name: instantiator
Parameter.Abstract: A block used to create a new cached object instance. This block will be executed only when there is not an existing cached value in thread-local storage. It is considered an error for the instantiator block to return nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The cached object, which should not be nil unless there is an error within the instantiator block.
